ClassModel.XmlComment: Feriado data access component. Manages CRUD operations for the Feriado table.

MethodModel.Name: Create
MethodModel.XmlComment: Inserts a new row in the Feriado table.

MethodModel.Name: UpdateById
MethodModel.XmlComment: Updates an existing row in the Feriado table.

MethodModel.Name: DeleteById
MethodModel.XmlComment: Conditionally deletes one or more rows in the Feriado table.

MethodModel.Name: SelectById
MethodModel.XmlComment: Returns a row from the Feriado table.

MethodModel.Name: Select
MethodModel.XmlComment: Conditionally retrieves one or more rows from the Feriado table.
